Title: Kubernetes and Challenges in Cloud-Agnostic Strategies
Description: We sometimes see customers who are not only pursuing a containerization strategy with Kubernetes, but also attempting to achieve a portable solution that targets the Kubernetes offering on all major cloud service providers (CSPs) at the same time (namely, AKS, EKS, and GKE).  Achieving this portability is perceived as a strategy to avoid vendor lock-in and to minimize financial risk through negotiating power.

Title: Cloudflare customers are protected from the Atlassian Confluence CVE-2022-26134
Description: On June 02, 2022 Atlassian released a security advisory for their Confluence Server and Data Center applications, highlighting a critical severity unauthenticated remote code execution vulnerability.

Title: Migrating MR.Gestures from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI
Description: In this guest blog post, Michael Rumpler shares how he ported his popular Xamarin.Forms library, MR.Gestures, to support .NET MAUI.
